Posts.Content: Lady_Airsong wrote: Hi Everyone! I am having a BMX on 04 Nov 14 and I am thrilled to find you Ladies!!! I personally feel that I do not need my breasts to "be a woman" despite what everyone else (friends & extended family) are saying! Anyone want to share their story?? I would love to listen!Â  Airsong Dx 9/3/2014, DCIS, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+ Surgery 11/4/2014 Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel, Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Soon to be a "Newbie..." Lady_Airsong Lady_Airsong
